data.name: RPG Maker MV - 90s Retro Sounds - Adventure
data.detailed_description:
This is a sound set reminiscent of the 1990s consumer RPG games.
Through restricting the number of simultaneous sounds to mimic the hardware limitation of the days, these unique game tune styles of the 90s will color your work with a classic, nostalgic feel of the old days.

This set contains 14 tracks intended to be used in dungeons, fields, vehicles, and other stages/maps of an adventure.

This set especially suits those who likes mildly emotional melodies of the 90s but with less "bleep” elements .

■Included music（ogg, m4a）
1.The mysterious forest（dungeons）
2.Challenging the tower（dungeons）
3.Like a shadow（dungeons）
4.Voice of the dark（dungeons）
5.Ice cave（dungeons）
6.Ancient ruins（dungeons）
7.Decision time（dungeons）
8.Travelers（fields）
9.Wandering fencer（fields）
10.A world in ruins（fields）
11.Between the sky and the earth（vehicle）
12.Swaying gently（vehicle）
13.Let the wind carry you away（vehicle）
14.A new world（vehicle）
